data.title: Susan Sarandon Movies and Shows
data.meta_description: Learn about Susan Sarandon on Apple TV. Browse shows and movies that feature Susan Sarandon including Arbitrage, The Company You Keep, and more.
data.text:
The One with Joey's New Brain

Ross plans a surprise for Monica and Chandler's wedding--he wants to play the bagpipes. Drake Ramoray is coming out of his coma on Days of Our Lives. A diva will be killed off and her character's brain will be transplanted into Drake's. Joey and the diva hook up. Phoebe and Rachel fight over a guy who left his cell phone in Central Perk.

Queen of Jordan

Jack (Alec Baldwin) puts Liz in charge of an event for Angie in the hopes that she can emotionally manipulate Angie into making an appeal to Tracy. The "Queen of Jordan" cameras bring Jack some embarrassment while leaving Jenna starved for attention. A lost love returns to Frank's (Judah Friedlander) life, causing him to question his maturity. Susan Sarandon guest stars.

Alexis Goodlooking and the Case of the Missing Whisky

In order to hide his relationship with Lynn (guest star Susan Sarandon), Frank (Judah Friedlander) convinces his mother (guest star Patti LuPone) that he is dating Liz (Tina Fey). Tracy (Tracy Morgan) and Jenna (Jane Krakowski) team up to try to solve the case of Peteâs missing whisky. Meanwhile, Jack (Alec Baldwin) teaches Kenneth (Jack McBrayer) how to take down his first business nemesis.

Careful What You Dig For

Molly meets her literary idol, J.C. Small (guest star SUSAN SARANDON), a cynic who advises her to write about things in her life that she wouldn't want people to know. Meanwhile, Mike invites his mother over for dinner in an effort to cheer her up.
